rules_text:
{BR}: Stunt Devil becomes a Devil Actor with base power and toughness 2/2.
{BR}{BR}: If Stunt Devil is an Actor, put a menace counter on it and it becomes a Devil Actor Assassin with base power and toughness 3/3.
{BR}{BR}{BR}{BR}: If Stunt Devil is an Assassin, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then it deals 2 damage to any target.
